EmailTemplate.subject: Are You Still Monitoring and Reacting to Alerts?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IT 1.0 vs. IT 2.0
Are you still monitoring and reacting, or are you controlling?
{{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, you recently downloaded a trial of VMTurbo Operations Manager, so we wanted to share with you the success of one of our amazing customers, Travelport. Hear from Steve Senecal <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/travelport-assures-private-cloud-performance-vmturbo/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture>, Global Director of Server Engineering at Travelport on how he controls more than 1,000 Cisco UCS blades within Travelport's private cloud.
Your IT Control System, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
